name: Fantasy Secret
description:
"Fantasy Secret" is a puzzle casual game that anyone can easily get started but is very unique. Drag the fragments and combine them into a complete picture to win the game and cute girls cg.

Each level has a different difficulty level. Obstacles such as unknown blocks and bombs bring you different challenges and rich gaming experiences.

Features:

  • All kinds of anime pictures
  • Funny gameplay
  • Relaxing music
  • CG gallery
  • Interesting level challenges
